text: You should donate to Save the Children. Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
how much of my money donated will go to the children?
Whatever amount you choose will go to the children.
okay I will donate $2

Excellent! I'm glad that you've decided to donate to help save the children. However, for the purposes of this HIT, we need to reach a minimum of 10 chat turns. I believe both of us should have 8 left.
Okay are we supposed to talk about the charity?
According to their website, 86% of funding went directly to program services. That means more of your dollar is directly contributing to saving the children.
great, do you know what countries the children are from?
Save the Children actually has several programs in the USA. They also have programs in many countries around the world. In fact, it might be easier to mention where they DON'T operate.
Will you be donating also?
I will indeed. I'll be donating so that the children get the maximum benefit.
I am happy to hear that the donations are used programs in the USA as well as abroad.
It's pretty amazing. According to the website, they help 157 million children in 120 countries.
I saw on the website you can donate through amazon. That makes it easy for people like me.
They also have ways to donate investments and IRA distributions. So there's many different options for however people prefer donating.
That is interesting, I have never heard of that way to donate.
Yeah, it's pretty thorough. So, just to confirm, you'll be donating $2 to Save the Children?
Yes, I will donate $2
Excellent! Your contribution will make a difference in someone's life. Thank you so much and have a good day.
THank you, you have a great day as well.
